description:
At Valhalla Pure Outfitters, we have sourced the best 160wt 100% Pure Merino T-Shirt.

Made with ethically grown pure Merino yarn from Australia that is produced by our technical friends at Schoeller Textiles in Austria. The fibers are super-fine at only 16 microns! Knitted and sewn from a state-of-the-art factory in Czech Republic, Europe. And then imported directly from Europe by Valhalla Pure Outfitters. No synthetic means no performance compromises.

So pure, you can bury it in your vegetable garden when it wears out. Performance natural fibers rule!
name: Lasting Merino 30 Year 100% Merino Wool LS T-Shirt - Mens
